articles.title: Trixie Chua, founder of Singapore sustainable fashion brand Dear Samfu - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Could grandma’s fashion sensibilities be the answer to the massive wastage of fast fashion? Trixie Chua, founder of sustainable fashion brand Dear Samfu thinks so. CNA Women speaks to her in this instalment of our women in sustainability series.
articles.content: The cheongsam is fast becoming a fixture in the wardrobe of many Chinese women as more embrace their Asian heritage. In contrast, few know about the cheongsams more practical cousin, the samfu, even … [+894 chars]

articles.title: Top Gun: Maverick debuts to stratospheric US$124m at US box office - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: It's the highest-grossing debut in Cruise's 40-year career, and his first to surpass US$100 million on opening weekend.
articles.content:
Tom Cruise may have pulled off one of the most daring stunts of his career getting audiences to go to the movies for something that doesn't involve superheroes.

articles.title: Jury's duty in Johnny Depp-Amber Heard trial doesn't track public debate - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Depp has denied any physical or sexual abuse, and says Heard concocted the claims to destroy his reputation. Depp's legions of online fans have focused on their belief that Heard has been untruthful, and that will determine the outcome.
articles.content: A seven-person civil jury in Virginia will resume deliberations Tuesday in Johnny Depp's libel trial against Amber Heard. What the jury considers will be very different from the public debate that ha… [+4693 chars]

articles.title: Commentary: South Korea's Son Heung-min shows Asians can be top footballers - CNA
articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur star Son Heung-min may make waves by being the first Asian player to win the English Premier League Golden Boot, but his influence goes far beyond the pitch, says John Duerden.
articles.content: Online news magazine The Diplomat also pointed out the stereotypes that English commentators rely on to describe players: European players are discussed in terms of skill, black players are powerful … [+1647 chars]

articles.title: In her 40s, she walked away from a successful banking career to pursue her passion as a jazz musician - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In this week's instalment of Creative Capital, we spotlight 47-year-old Cheryl Ann Spencer left the world of banking to study jazz. Graduating during the pandemic, she put together Evolution Quartet and released the group’s first album, Pandemic Blues.
articles.content:
I KNOW YOU DID A GIG IN FEBRUARY. IS THE QUARTET PERFORMING MORE THIS YEAR?
